author: andschwa
body:

- [x] Update readme links
- [x] Update installation docs

- [x] Build and test Ubuntu 16.04 package
- [x] Build and test CentOS 7 package
- [x] Build and test OS X package
- [x] Build and test MSI package
- [x] Create new GitHub release with changelog and packages

title: Release 6.0.0-alpha.8
